弴字的基本解释

弴
diāo
皇帝用的漆成红色的弓：“楚柘质劲，必资榜檠，以成弴弓。”

弴字的汉语字典释义

[①]［diāo］
［《廣韻》都聊切，平蕭，端。］
［《廣韻》都昆切，平魂，端。］
天子之弓。

弴字的康熙字典解释

【寅集下】【弓字部】　弴； 康熙笔画：11； 页码：页359第15
【廣韻】【集韻】【韻會】?都昆切，音敦。【說文】畫弓也。【韻會】雕弓。【廣韻】天子弴弓。　又【廣韻】都聊切【正韻】丁聊切，?音貂。義同。

弴字的源字形

字源演变：

小篆楷体

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体日本明朝体韩国明朝体旧字形
弴字的起名意思

暂无。

Bei
Basic explanation of words
Bei
diāo
The red painted bow used by the emperor: "Chu Zhe has a high quality and strength, and he must be qualified to make a bow."
Bei
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［diāo］
["Guangyun" all talk and cut, Pingxiao, Duan. ]
["Guangyun" all Kunqie, Ping Hun, Duan. ]
The bow of the emperor.
Bei
Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[Yin Jixia] [Bow Character Department] 　弴; Kangxi Strokes: 11; Page Number: Page 359 15
[Guang Yun] [Ji Yun] [Yun Hui]? Du Kunqie, Yin Dun. [Said Wen] Draw a bow. [Rhyme Club] Sculpture bow. [Guangyun] The emperor Bi Gong.　[Guang Yun] All chatting and cutting [Zheng Yun] Ding chatting and cutting,? Yin mink. The same meaning.
